MC
1. Some text and then an equation $$\frac{5}{2}=\sqrt{4}$$. And with some symbols like quotes: "a quote", and an ampersand &.
*A. answer A
B. answer B
C. answer C

1. Another question with equations in the answers. And a simple equation g = GC + 5. 
A. $$\frac{5}{2}>\sqrt{4}$$
*B. $$\frac{5}{2}\le\sqrt{4}$$
